price: Yookiin waan isaan hojjataniin isaan balleessa; baay’ee irraa dhiifama godha.
arabic: أَوۡ يُوبِقۡهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ وَيَعۡفُ عَن كَثِيرٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: aw yūbiq'hunna bimā kasabū wayaʿfu ʿan kathīrin
